title: Episode 191: Compose Lazy Layouts
description: We recorded episode 191 from the studio in the London office, where Rebecca Franks from the developer relations team joined Chet as a guest host. We talked with Andrei Shikov, Matvei Malkov, and Andrey Kulikov from the Jetpack Compose engineering team about layouts, especially the lazy ones, which are the Compose equivalent of RecyclerView. Rebecca, Chet, Andrei, Andrey, and Matvei, in the London recording studio.   Links: Layouts in Compose Compose Custom layouts ADB 167: Jetpack Compose Layout   Chet: @chethaase Romain: @romainguy Tor: @tornorbye Rebecca Franks: @riggaroo Andrei Shikov: @shikasd_ Matvei Malkov: @matvei_jj Andrey Kulikov: @and_kulikov

html:
Welcome to Android Developers Backstage, a podcast by and for Android developers. Hosted by developers from the Android platform team, this show covers topics of interest to Android programmers, with in-depth discussions and interviews with engineers on the Android team at Google.

  1. All Episodes
  2. Episode 191: Compose Lazy Layouts

Nov 11, 2022

We recorded episode 191 from the studio in the London office, where Rebecca Franks from the developer relations team joined Chet as a guest host. We talked with Andrei Shikov, Matvei Malkov, and Andrey Kulikov from the Jetpack Compose engineering team about layouts, especially the lazy ones, which are the Compose equivalent of RecyclerView.

Rebecca, Chet, Andrei, Andrey, and Matvei, in the London recording studio.

Links:

  • Layouts in Compose
  • Compose Custom layouts
  • ADB 167: Jetpack Compose Layout
